summary: Internal email from Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe updating her team about arranging an interview with David Rodgers, who is currently on a cruise. Rodgers' attorney has indicated his client's willingness to cooperate, with logistics for an interview in New York being discussed for late January or early February 2020.

persons.name: David Rodgers
persons.context: Individual whom the Southern District of New York is seeking to interview. He is currently on a cruise and his attorney has indicated he is willing to cooperate.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: Author of the email, updating her team about the status of arranging an interview with David Rodgers and discussing logistics with his attorneys.

connections.description: Alison Moe, an AUSA, is coordinating an interview with David Rodgers as part of an investigation.

events.title: Email update on David Rodgers interview
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe emails her team to inform them that David Rodgers' attorney has responded, indicating Rodgers' willingness to be interviewed after he returns from a cruise.

events.title: Planned interview of David Rodgers
events.description: Logistics are being arranged to fly David Rodgers to New York for an interview with prosecutors, targeting late January or early February 2020.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: David Rodgers was a subject of interest for an interview by the Southern District of New York in early 2020.
Rodgers' attorney communicated his client's willingness to cooperate, but scheduling was delayed as Rodgers was on a cruise.
Prosecutors planned to fly Rodgers to New York for the interview, with a target timeframe of late January or early February 2020.
The communication is an internal team update from Assistant U.S. Attorney Alison Moe.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity by the SDNY in January 2020.
